content: नैमिष {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (षी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) Lasting for a ‘nimisha’ or twinkling, momentary, transient. --षं <ab>N.</ab> of a sacred forest celebrated as the residence of certain sages to whom Sauti related the Mahābhārata; <ls>R. 19. 1</ls>; (the name is thus derived: --यतस्तु निमिषेणेदं निहतं दानवं बलं . अरण्येऽस्मिंस्ततस्तेन नैमिषारण्यसंज्ञितं ..).
